title: Plus One Month Free! Wonderful Closet Space! Newly Renovated!
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Canyon Drive Manor!Our beautiful Hollywood community offers studios, one and two bedroom apartments.', 'Interior amenities include new vinyl planking, stove, dishwasher, air conditioner, ceramic tile in kitchen and bathroom.', 'Community benefits include laundry facility, control access entry, refreshing pool, relaxing barbecue area, sauna, fitness center, and subterranean parking.', 'Canyon Drive Manor is conveniently located in Franklin Village and near Gelsons, Rite Aid, 24 hour fitness and CVS with excellent freeway access to 101 freeway and moments away from the MTA.', 'Canyon Drive Manor Apartments has everything you are looking for and it is right in the glamour of it all!', 'Contact our friendly and professional leasing team and find your new home at Canyon Drive Manor Apartments in Hollywood!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., CA - License # 01834798', '-Pool', '-View', '-Cable Ready', '-On-Site Management', '-Courtyard', '-Laundry Facilities', '-Recycling', '-Night Patrol', '-Covered Parking', '-Dishwasher', '-Ceiling Fan', '-Fitness Center', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'For more information, visit us at: <URL>', 'Our beautiful Hollywood community offers studios, one- and two-bedroom apartments.', 'Interior amenities include vinyl planking, stove, dishwasher, air conditioner, ceramic tile in kitchen and bathroom.', 'Community features include laundry facility, control access entry, refreshing pool, relaxing barbecue area, fitness center, and subterranean parking.', 'Canyon Drive Manor is conveniently located in Franklin Village.', 'Minutes from Gelsons, Rite Aid, 24-hour fitness and Hollywood attractions, with excellent freeway access to 101 and 5 freeways, and moments away from the MTA.', 'Canyon Drive Manor Apartments has everything you are looking for and it is right in the glamour of it all!', 'Contact our friendly and professional leasing team and find your new home at Canyon Drive Manor Apartments in Hollywood!', 'Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', '-Laundry Facility', '-Online Service Requests', '-Window Coverings', '-Patio/Balcony', '-Microwave', '-Refrigerator', '-Disposal', '-Dishwasher', '-Cable Ready', '-Air Conditioner', '-Carpeting', '-Ceiling Fan', '*Advertised rental rates Include Temporary Monthly Discount*', '*Advertised rate includes discount offered.', '\xa0 Pricing and Availability are subject to change.', 'Cities:\xa0 Los Feliz, Miracle Mile, Hollywood, Mid-Wilshire, West Hollywood, Echo Park']
